channel.title: Marilyn Manson
channel.description:
Here's one of my favorite songs by Marilyn Manson, teh Fight Song! (Yes, I am Gothic.) http://youtube.com/watch?v=rZ74G4lU84I
And for those of you who thinks that Marilyn Manson is a loser who is just Gothic for no reason, you have alot to learn. He has had one of the worst childhood's anyone could have, raped by his neighbor or dad or whatever.... Also the Columbine High School Massacre was not his fault. Maybe if teenagers these days had self-control, there would be no killing. Blame it on the people who actually let teens get their hands on guns, most likely the parents have no control over the actions of their sons and daughters, letting them get out of control. Do not blame Marilyn Manson for any mishaps from people listening to his music, it's their choices that make the mishaps, not his. They could just as well have done it anyways. (BTW, I'm not an emo Goth....)

item.title: Marilyn Manson
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

chewwie:

kk will i heard it from someone and is this true aswell i got told that he had a conset(cant spell it)and he had like 5 puppy dogs and he wouldnt play to people in the croud killed them dogs true or fulse??

False, he never actually murders anything. The most extreme thing he has ever done was burn fake bibles, or start riots during his concerts, but he keeps them under control and never wants anyone to really riot outside of his concerts from his music.

Read full topic

item.title: Marilyn Manson
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:11, topic:69158”][quote author=chewwie link=topic=101604.msg1034112#msg1034112 date=1174474515]
i heard of someone that he got his girlfriend to take her eye and like fuck her in the eye…just remember i heard it from someone is it true??
[/quote]

Really, everyone needs to forget every rumour they hear about him. He has never done anything close to that.[/quote]
Yeah, it’s all lies.
If someone does something after listening to his music, it’s their fault, not his. He doesn’t choose their actions…
I listen to his music and I’m probably the only person who deals with stuff in my school with common sense…

Read full topic
